title: booking and travel expenses portal
description: Corporate travel management system for the City Hall of Santos.
about: Development of the public interface for managing per diems and travel expenses, focusing on transparency for municipal spending.

contributions.text: Creation of all screens using Vue.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring 100% responsiveness.
Surveying, processing, and prioritizing public data to define the displayed indicators.
Implementation of rigorous accessibility standards to ensure access for all citizens.
